subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Chris Webber is playing for Detroit, his hometown team, and he is winning again. To him, these gifts overshadow the paradoxical questions that have trailed him whenever he has left a place.
snippet: Chris Webber is playing for Detroit, his hometown team, and he is winning again. To him, these gifts overshadow the paradoxical questions that have trailed him whenever he has left a place.
